name: HardPong
description:
This is a game inspired by tradition Pong with an increased difficulty level. Thus, Hard Pong was born.

Some of the Countries oof the 2022 Football World Cup were added to the first version, thus becoming a pong with World References.

Expected to add more Selections in Future updates.

Here it will be possible to play different game modes.

You will have the opportunity to try to defeat an AI ths is extremely Intelligent and with the reflexes Like a Pro Player, will you be able to defeat it?

Can play in 2 Players mode in the same Keyboard with you Friends.

For now its all .

Have Fun
